sentences: MEXICO highlighted preparations for COP 16 and COP/MOP 6.
Bangladesh, for the G-77/CHINA, expressed hope that effective participation of all developing countries would be ensured.

Emphasizing inclusive, transparent and democratic negotiations, BOLIVIA observed that the preparatory work for COP 16 and COP/MOP 6 should respect the separate negotiating tracks, mandates and outcomes of the AWG LCA and AWG-KP.
TUVALU emphasized that the high-level segment should be transparent.
SWITZERLAND highlighted the value of involving observer organizations, particularly the private sector.
The PHILIPPINES stressed that any rules regulating the participation of observers, especially IGOs, should not be arbitrarily applied.
SBI Chair Owen-Jones will chair a contact group.
